actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act of 1936, as amended, to authorize the establishment of a Great Lakes Regional Office.

summary.text: Provides, under the Merchant Marine Act, for the establishment of a Great Lakes regional office of the Maritime Administration to plan, coordinate, and implement activities and programs related to the Great Lakes-Saint Lawrence Seaway System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act of 1936, as amended, to authorize the establishment of a Great Lakes Regional Office.
